channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Apps and SDKs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Apps and SDKs

item.title: CVE-2024-27241|2024-08-02T00:27:59.870Z -- zoom%20communications%2C%20inc -- zoom%20apps%20and%20sdks
item.description: Improper input validation in some Zoom Apps and SDKs may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27238|2024-08-02T00:27:59.915Z -- zoom%20communications%2C%20inc -- zoom%20apps%20and%20sdks
item.description: Race condition in the installer for some Zoom Apps and SDKs for Windows before version 6.0.0 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a privilege escalation via local access.
